title: AWS Solution Architect
description: Master AWS cloud computing concepts, design scalable solutions, and implement deployment pipelines efficiently.

title: DevOps

title: Scrum Master

title: Full Stack Data Science
description: Learn Python, ML, and visualization techniques to become a complete Data Science professional.

title: SQL Unix Production Support (L2)
description: Develop strong database and Unix production support skills to handle enterprise-scale systems.

title: Big Data
description: Dive deep into Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka technologies to process and analyze large datasets efficiently.

title: Business Analyst
description: Learn to analyze business needs, document processes, and bridge communication between stakeholders and dev teams.

title: AR Caller RCM
description: Master AR Calling and Revenue Cycle Management processes used in healthcare billing systems.

title: Full Stack Developer

title: Medical Coding

title: Software Testing / QA
